explanation:
code_hardening: Added final modifiers to method parameters (uri, responseHeaders) and to local variables used during iteration (url, entry, headerKey, headerValues, headerValue). Preserved existing null checks and added a defensive null check for headerValues consistent with safe iteration.
resolve_compilation_errors: none.
exception_handling: none.
logic_customization: none.
refactoring: Removed the unnecessary this qualifier from webkitCookieManager. Replaced keySet()/get() iteration with entrySet() iteration for clarity while keeping behavior identical. Applied minor formatting and brace/whitespace consistency.
misc: Minor style cleanup and consistent indentation; no new APIs introduced.
